Rochester_Hills.Paint Creek (Oakland County, Michigan): Paint Creek is a 16.8-mile-long (27.0 km) stream in the U.S. state of Michigan, located in northern Oakland County and rising in Brandon Township in the northern part of the county. The creek drains through a series of lakes that lead into Lake Orion. Paint Creek continues as the outflow from the east end of Lake Orion in downtown Lake Orion.
